ComicInfo.Summary:
Detective Richard Fell, transferred over the bridge from the big city to the collapsing district of Snowtown, is still trying to make sense of his new life; juggling the awkward beginnings of a new relationship with the complications of a murder method new to him. Someone in Snowtown is killing pregnant women and stealing their foetuses... FELL is a new series by WARREN ELLIS (TRANSMETROPOLITAN, PLANETARY) and BEN TEMPLESMITH (30 DAYS OF NIGHT): each issue is a self-contained story, like any episode of LAW AND ORDER.
Detective Fell investigates the case of a murdered pregnant woman who's fetus had been cut out. With Mayko's help he is able to solve the case, which turns out more gruesome than he had ever imagined.
